special_text:
You may remove loyalty counters from Subject MW02 to pay part or all of the costs of loyalty abilities of other permanents you control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Subject MW02 dies, return her to the battlefield transformed.
[i](You may activate a loyalty ability of this permanent once during your turn as a sorcery.)[/i]
Flying
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each loyalty counter on Gemma Unbound.
